title: Crew Show!
description: On this episode we discuss pneumonia, dead batteries in McLarens, flipping Ferraris, high performance hybrids, right to repair laws, the Geneva auto show, and we review the Evoque and BMW X1.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: On this episode we discuss pneumonia, dead batteries in McLarens, flipping Ferraris, high performance hybrids, right to repair laws, the Geneva auto show, and we review the Evoque and BMW X1.
